overview: As the night falls, the hedonism begins. The City is calling. It's a time for sexual adventure. Pure erotic escapism, as pleasure hungry women seek to experience the delights of an adult playground.  Bored trophy wives, street hustlers and everyday working girls are all drawn to the excitement of Clubland. Seeking attention they indulge themselves as we witness their wild sexual conquests and lust for satisfaction.  In her fifth movie for Daring, female director Anjali Kara invites you to join her for an evening out in the world of the "Night Crawlers."
title: Night Crawlers
